divs: Sighting Detailsi was in me outhous and i looked up through my roof holes and sawed nin ufos then i heared little billy start to holler and then there was a flash of light and little billy was gone! i was scart half to dead! then my dog started yelpin and i ran inside my hous and my wife bo deen was cryin in the corner while they probeed her! so i ran back to my outhous and hided in the outhous hole then allofa sudden they was gone i were so scart it werent even funny! i hopes you believes me
Summary: them dang aliens flewed over my hous and stoled my dog and little billy
